Montauk Fire Insurance Company insurance policy to Christopher Jacobson
An 1887 insurance policy issued by the Montauk Fire Insurance Company of Brooklyn to Christopher Jacobson for a home in the Brooklyn neighborhood of Gravesend.
An 1887 insurance policy issued by the Montauk Fire Insurance Company of Brooklyn to Christopher Jacobson for a home in the Brooklyn neighborhood of Gravesend.
Insurance policy issued by the Montauk Fire Insurance Company of Brooklyn to Christopher Jacobson for a home in the Brooklyn neighborhood of Gravesend. It is dated October 4, 1887.
